data.title: Data Scientist Semisenior
tasks: Building cross-platform applications with React Native.

data.title: Data Scientist Consultant
tasks: Building cross-platform applications with React Native.

data.title: Data and Collections Analyst
tasks: I developed and implemented a classification model using decision trees for new segmentations and thus increased recovery.
Designed portfolio management by building customer profiles differentiated by the use of digital channels and financial information. (unsupervised model)
Reduced provisioning and debt recovery in the portfolio by building a model that measures the probability of migrating from one default range to another.

data.title: Data Science Assistant - Credit Risk
tasks: I created a non-parametric model (LIGHT GBM) for customer segmentation for the monthly credit card origination campaign, which allowed us to increase the number of credit card placements.
I created a web scraping project to obtain data from RENIEC. A total of 24 million data from 4 million different people were obtained.

data.title: IT Data and Projects Assistant
tasks: I carried out a machine vision project for counting sugar bags in the packaging area, replacing a project that was estimated to cost 14 thousand dollars by a company specialized in machine vision.

I carried out a project using neural networks through the K-Nearest-Neighbor algorithm, capable of predicting the supersaturation of grains in the sugar crystallization process, improving efficiency by 20%, using the Python programming language.
